text: I have been developing in python for a few years.
I have read introduction from Oracle and now I am wondering what are the industry standards in javaEE development?
I am planning to deploy my projects on Google App Engine (is it good idea?
), therefore I believe that JPO is one of the main subjects.
After few hours I feel pretty comfortable with it.
What techniques and frameworks are used to create large scale web applications such as banks, shops and so on?
Could you give me a hint in which direction should I go?
